name: Bottle Dash
description:
Bottle Dash -  by Gabriel Chan and Shirley Yang

This game was made from scratch in 48 hours, during Innovator's Jam 2021.

You get to download both versions!

APK is for Android, ZIP file is for Windows

Current Version: V1.1

V1.1

  • Increase size of hitbox on items
  • Made the spawning speed increase more gradually in Free Play mode
  • Changed it so bottles can’t be picked up once placed in the basket
  • Lowered the capacity of the baskets from 10 to 5
  • Fixed bug where a basket would flash even though it’s empty
  • Fixed bug where the incorrect level number would display at the end of the level
  • Fixed bug where UI wouldn’t close upon restarting a level
  • Fixed bug where music wouldn’t play upon restarting a level
  • Fixed bug where win/lose sound would play too late
  • Fixed bug where basket wouldn’t clear at the end of the level
